ing: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 small roma (plum) tomato, seeded and chopped
2 Thai chile peppers, seeded and chopped
des: "I had to improvise something that would go with salsa, but turns out, this is just as good on its own. It disappeared before the salsa did and everyone asked for the recipe! Serve with melba toast or tortilla chips."
ins: Stir the corn, onion, tomato, cucumber, mint, basil, Thai chile peppers, lime juice, and mayonnaise together in a bowl. Refrigerate overnight or 8 hours before serving.
